name: Pink Onion
author: Pratul L.
description:
This place was decent, but not 4.5 stars in my book. More like 3.5

Pizza is a bit greasy with a floppy crust on the cheese end of the pie. The crust is good. Ingredients are good quality.

I ordered the pink onion - great set of ingredients, but boy was it spicy! I think the spice is part of the sauce itself. I'm Indian and even this pie was too spicy for my taste. So spicy I couldn't even finish it. On the plus side I inadvertently side portion controlled.

If the pie was less spicy I'd give it a 4 stars for delivery pizza
